mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PW FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberID} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "MEMBER" ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PW ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw} )
